epinisa ohu yodaganne gamniyamgam winiwidina angalum karmantha shalaya. 1990 mada hariya wana wita, juniyas jayawardhana wisin handunwa denu labu wiwrutha aarthika pa්rathipaththiya, ranasinha pe්ramadasa wisin themparadu karanu laduwa, kethek aindriyawa jana jiwithayata baddha wanneda kiyathoth pa්rathiwadinta pawa eyin thorawa thama pa්rathipaththi pa්rakashaya liwiya nohaki wanneya.eksath jathika pakshaye uparima nawa libaral palanaya apata hamuwanne ranil wika්ramasinha yatatheya. 2001 di ohuge agamathikamin araumbaena rajaya merata siyalu rajayan athurin nawalibaralwadi muladharma wadath samipawa ka්riyathmaka karanta uthsaha gath rajaya se ithihasa gathawanu nisakaya.
